channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Migrate Users
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Migrate Users

item.title: CVE-2021-24477|2024-08-03T19:35:20.095Z -- unknown -- migrate%20users
item.description: The Migrate Users WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not sanitise or escape its Delimiter option before outputting in a page, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue. Furthermore, the plugin does not have CSRF check in place when saving its options, allowing the issue to be exploited via a CSRF attack.
